metadata.title: Student Cafeteria
metadata.description: Fresh dishes every day for students

mobileMenu.title: STUDENT CAFETERIA
mobileMenu.description: Every day we serve homemade meals. For over 35 years we have been a meeting place for students where you can enjoy a delicious lunch and relax.

promotions.title: Student Promotions
promotions.subtitle: New deals every day just for you

mainDishes.title: MAIN DISHES
mainDishes.subtitle: Fresh, homemade lunches prepared every day

drinks.title: DRINKS
drinks.subtitle: Cold and hot beverages for every meal

paragraphs.p1: For over 35 years, we have been serving students delicious, homemade meals at affordable prices. Our cafeteria is a place where tradition meets modernity, and every dish is prepared with passion and attention to detail.
paragraphs.p2: We believe that a good meal is the foundation of a successful day of learning. That's why every morning our team of experienced chefs prepares fresh dishes from the finest ingredients. Our menu is varied and changes seasonally to always offer students something new and tasty.
paragraphs.p3: We are proud that over the years we have become not only a place to eat, but also a meeting point for students where they can relax, chat, and recharge before their next classes.

freshProducts.title: Fresh Products
freshProducts.subtitle: Daily
freshProducts.description: All our dishes are prepared from fresh products delivered every morning.

quality.title: Proven Quality
quality.subtitle: No Compromises
quality.description: We control the quality of every ingredient to ensure the highest standards.

affordablePrices.title: Affordable Prices
affordablePrices.subtitle: For Students
affordablePrices.description: Our prices are tailored to the student budget without compromising quality.

homeAtmosphere.title: Home Atmosphere
homeAtmosphere.subtitle: Like Mom's
homeAtmosphere.description: We create a friendly place where every student feels at home.

mainHall.title: Main Hall
mainHall.description: Spacious and cozy dining room for students

conferenceRoom.title: Conference Room
conferenceRoom.description: Modern space for meetings and events

ourDishes.title: Our Dishes
ourDishes.description: Fresh and delicious meals every day

conferences.title: Organize with Us
conferences.description: We invite you to organize various events at our cafeteria, where we perfect every detail with the utmost care. Thanks to years of experience and professional service, we guarantee that every celebration will be unforgettable.

small.title: Small Hall
small.description: Ideal space for intimate business meetings, presentations, and training sessions. The room is equipped with modern multimedia equipment, ensuring comfortable conditions for meetings. Perfect for groups up to 20 people.

large.title: Large Hall
large.description: Spacious conference room designed for larger events, conferences, and training sessions. Equipped with professional sound, lighting, and projection systems. Ideal for groups up to 100 people, with flexible layout options.

events.title: Special Events
events.description: We organize events at the highest level. From intimate family celebrations to large corporate events - we provide comprehensive catering services, professional organization, and unforgettable experiences for your guests.

catering.title: Catering
catering.description: Professional catering service for any event. Fresh products, signature menu, and experienced team of chefs. We will customize the offer to your needs and budget. We serve events from 20 to 500 people.

grillsAndPicnics.title: BBQs and Picnics
grillsAndPicnics.description: We organize corporate BBQs and team-building picnics. We provide equipment, service, and delicious grilled food. Perfect for outdoor meetings, team-buildings, and summer events. Delivery to specified location available.

corporateEvents.title: Corporate Events
corporateEvents.description: Comprehensive organization of corporate events - conferences, training, team meetings, anniversaries, and business celebrations. Professional service, catering, and conference rooms equipped with modern AV equipment.

communionsAndBaptisms.title: Communions and Baptisms
communionsAndBaptisms.description: Unique family celebrations by us. We will prepare a delicious menu, take care of decorations and service. We will create an unforgettable atmosphere for your family and guests. We will adapt to traditions and your expectations.

wakes.title: Wakes and Special Gatherings
wakes.description: With respect and care, we organize wakes and other special gatherings. We provide discreet service, appropriate menu, and intimate atmosphere. We will help with every detail so you can focus on what matters most.

cta.title: Let's Plan Your Event Together
cta.description: Contact us to discuss the details of your event. We will prepare an offer tailored to your needs and budget.
